  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4772</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Water To and From Our Homes</string>
            <string language="es">El agua a y desde nuestras casas</string>
            <string language="ga">Uisce chuig agus ó ár dTithe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser nach und von unseren Häusern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'eau à et de nos maisons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Água a e de nossas HOME</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acqua a e da le nostre sedi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ύδωρ σε και από τις "Οικίαές μας</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Explanation of the journey of water from source to taps. Also looks at hard water and soft water and how to create a water filter.</string>
            <string language="es">Explicación del viaje del agua desde su origen hasta los grifos. También trata sobre el agua dura y el agua blanda y cómo crear un filtro de agua.</string>
            <string language="ga">Míniú ar thuras uisce ón bhfoinse go sconnaí. Féachann sé freisin ar uisce crua agus uisce bog agus an chaoi le scagaire uisce a dhéanamh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE Geography</string>
            <string language="es">Geografía SESE</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Tíreolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Human Environments</string>
            <string language="es">Entornos humanos. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Timpeallachtaí Daonna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erklärung der Reise des Wassers von Quelle zu 
Hähne. Auch Blicke auf hartes Wasser und weiches Wasser und wie
man einen Wasserfilter herstellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explication du voyage de l'eau de la source aux 
prises. En outre regards à l'eau calcareuse et à l'eau molle 
et comment créer un filtre de l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explanação da viagem da água da fonte às 
torneiras. Também olhares na água dura e na água macia e como
criar um filtro da água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spiegazione del viaggio di acqua dalla sorgente ai
colpetti. Inoltre sguardi ad acqua dura e ad acqua molle e come 
creare un filtro dell'acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξήγηση του ταξιδιού του ύδατος από την πηγή στις 
βρύσες. Επίσης εξετάζει το σκληρό ύδωρ και το μαλακό ύδωρ
και πώς να δημιουργήσει ένα φίλτρο ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschliche Umgebungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Géographie de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Environnements Humains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geografia de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ambientes Humanos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Geografia di SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ambienti Umani</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωγραφία SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρώπινα περιβάλλοντα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
